articles.title: FM Spokesman Warns US of Serious Consequences of Worst Situation
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Warns US of Serious Consequences of Worst Situation 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs released the following statement on Saturday as regards the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to such projected military provocation of the south Korean puppet forces as planning to conduct again shelling from Yonphyong Island under the instigation of the U.S.:
					 Lurking behind the plan of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to persistently conduct shelling from Yonphyong Island, the most sensitive dispute-torn area, is a sinister design to preserve the "northern limit line" and ignite a war at any cost.
					
					 By origin, this line was an illegal product as it was in violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement and all military moves of the south Korean puppet forces to defend it are gross violation of the AA.
					
					 According to Paragraph 13 of Article 2 of the AA, all the islands lying to the north and west of the provincial boundary line between Hwanghae Province and Kyonggi Province, except five islands including Paekryong and Yonphyong islands under the occupation of U.S. forces at that time, and all waters come under the control of the KPA side. And according to Paragraph 15 of Article 2 of the AA, the other side is barred from conducting any military action in the coastal areas under the control of the KPA side and in case of any such action the KPA side has the right to take whatever action it deems necessary.
					
					 After the conclusion of the AA, Clark, UN forces commander, unilaterally fixed the "northern limit line." This was a wanton violation of Paragraph 61 of Article 5 of the AA which stipulates that any modification of the AA can be made only under an agreement between both sides.
					
					 U.S. authorities including the U.S. secretary of State and the U.S. ambassador in south Korea admitted in the 1970s that the "northern limit line" was an illegal line in violation of international law. 
					
					 Even when the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces recently staged provocative military exercises one after another, the DPRK exercised self-restraint to the maximum unless their bullets and shells directly dropped in the territorial waters of the DPRK, prompted by the desire to prevent the situation from deteriorating on the Korean Peninsula and protect peace and stability.  
					
					 Nevertheless, they are planning to fire shells again into territorial waters of the DPRK from Yonphyong Island where the atmosphere of fierce battle prevails due to the military clash that occurred in November. This is an intolerable mockery of the self-restraint on the part of the DPRK and an unjustifiable hostile provocation. 
					
					 The shelling to be perpetrated by the puppet forces of south Korea at last, trespassing on the prohibiting line would make it impossible to prevent the situation on the Korean Peninsula from exploding and escape its ensuing disaster. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK has already clarified solemnly that they would mete out decisive and merciless punishment to the provocateurs who encroach upon the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the DPRK.  
					
					 The KPA does not make an empty talk. 
					
					 It is necessary to clearly state in advance that the hostile forces will be accountable for the second Yonphyong Island incident in the light of the fact that they tried to paint the first Yonphyong Island clash as a "provocation" of the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the incident as it instigated the south Korean puppet forces to perpetrated the provocation. The entire international community including the neighboring countries is demanding an unconditional halt to the dangerous shelling from the island but it is only the U.S. that is openly egging them onto it. 
					
					 It is, at the same time, making such threat and blackmail to the DPRK as urging it not to take any measure for self-defence.  
					
					 After flying into south Korea in the first half of this month the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff carefully worked out together with the puppet military warmongers a plan for shelling from the island to be staged by the south Korean forces with the assistance of U.S. forces. This plan calls on the U.S. troops to take a direct part in the projected shelling under the guise of command and observation, the provision of communication and medical care and the U.S. forces present in south Korea and all the troops of the puppet army to support the shelling, keeping themselves combat-ready. 
					
					 The U.S. Department of State sent a threatening message to the DPRK, urging it not to forget there are Americans and foreign reporters on the island. The U.S. is providing even "a human shield."
					
					 All facts patently prove that the U.S. does not hesitate to harass peace and stability of a country for meeting its strategic interests. 
					
					 The DPRK will force the U.S. to pay dearly for all the worst situations prevailing on the peninsula and its ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Niger Head of State
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Niger Head of State
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Salou Djibo, president of the Supreme Council for the Restoration of Democracy and head of state of Niger, on the occasion of the anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop on good terms and wished him and the people of Niger successes in their efforts for the stability and peaceful development of the country.

articles.title: 400-Year-Old Medical Book
articles.content:
400-Year-Old Medical Book 
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- 400 years has elapsed since Tonguibogam (encyclopedia of traditional medicines of Korea) was compiled.
					 The 25-volume book is one of Korea's three famous old medical books, along with Hyangyakjipsongbang (85 volumes published in 1433) and Uibangryuchwi (365 volumes compiled in 1445).
					
					 It was compiled by Ho Jun (1546-1615), a medical man famous in the country at that time, in 1610 on the basis of his longtime clinical experience and in reference to hundreds of medical books, amassing the traditional medical knowledge gained until the early 17th century.
					
					 It, which consists of a catalogue (2 volumes), internal medicine (4 volumes), external medicine (4 volumes), diseases (11 volumes), decoction (3 volumes) and acupuncture and moxibustion (1 volume), gives details of the structure and physiology of human body and examination, prevention and treatment methods of various diseases, as well as folk remedies.
					
					 The book, reprinted several times including in 1814 and 1874 in the country, was also printed in China and Japan.
					
					 The book was translated into modern Korean language in Juche 51 (1962) and again in 1982, divided into five collections with annotation.

articles.title: US-Japan Dangerous Military Nexus Assailed
articles.content:
US-Japan Dangerous Military Nexus Assailed 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Half a century since the "U.S.-Japan security pact" was revised witnessed the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries' moves for aggression and war and their military provocations against the DPRK and interference in its internal affairs, observes Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article. 
					 Citing facts to prove this, the article goes on: 
					
					 This year, too, the U.S. and Japan reexamined and newly amended the "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines" adopted in 1997 and the U.S.-Japan joint operation plan 5055 in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula announced in 2004 as part of the moves to put the "U.S.-Japan security system" on a new stage. 
					
					 The aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries through the revision of the "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines" is to mobilize all troops of the "Self-Defense Forces" in "contingency" on the peninsula as requested by the U.S. imperialists and hurl them into an offensive against the DPRK.
					
					 The same aim was sought by the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries through their move to rewrite the U.S.-Japan joint operation plan 5055 which specifies operation plans to be carried out under the simulated conditions of "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and operation means and methods to start a war and striking methods, etc. Their objective was to review various military operation plans worked out to ignite a new war in Korea and round off their scenario for the second Korean war on its basis.
					
					 What merits attention in tightening the U.S.-Japan military nexus is that they accelerated the joint development of the missile defense system and its deployment. 
					
					 The U.S.-Japan joint military exercises were staged for the purpose of mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK from A to Z. In other words, they were conducted under the simulated conditions of an actual war within the framework of the triangular military alliance grouping the U.S., Japan and south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists staged DPRK-targeted war exercises one after another in the air and on the land and in the seas of south Korea and Japan with huge armed forces of their followers and mobile strike force of aircraft carrier involved under such tense situation where a war may break out any moment. This saber-rattling was staged according to the U.S. "Gunboat Diplomacy", horror strategy and scenario for the second Korean war. 
					
					 The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries had better behave themselves, bearing in mind that their moves to tighten the military nexus for aggression would get them nowhere.

articles.title: S. Korea's Cooperation with Outside Forces under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Cooperation with Outside Forces under Fire
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- After sparking off the Yonphyong Island shelling incident the south Korean conservative authorities, prodded by their masters the U.S. and Japan, are getting evermore frantic in the cooperation campaign against the DPRK. This is unpardonable as it is a treacherous reckless act to do harm to fellow countrymen and finally ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces.
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The cooperation campaign frantically stepped up by the south Korean conservative authorities against the DPRK clearly shows for what purpose they sparked off the above-said incident. The ulterior aim sought by them through the incident was to deliberately trigger off armed clashes in a bid to drive the situation to the brink of a war and, under this pretext, do harm to compatriots with the help of outside forces.
					
					The U.S. domination over south Korea and its dependence upon the former are getting evermore serious due to the conservative group's closer cooperation with outside forces in its campaign against the DPRK. In the final analysis, the U.S. is exploiting this campaign for realizing its wild ambition to dominate the world.
					
					The same can be said of Japan watching for a chance to stage a comeback to Korea. Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan openly disclosed the fact that he is now examining the dispatch of the "Self-Defense Forces" to the Korean Peninsula for protecting Japanese in "contingency".
					
					The conservative group's cooperation with outside forces in their operation to do harm to compatriots is as foolish an act as digging their own graves.
					
					Should the conservative group provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK together with their American and Japanese masters, they will have to pay a dear price for this. The U.S. and Japan had better bear in mind that it is a pipe-dream for them to instigate the authorities of south Korea to ignite a war against the DPRK in a bid to fish in troubled waters.

articles.title: S. Korea's Ever Closer Cooperation with Foreign Forces Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Ever Closer Cooperation with Foreign Forces Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative authorities' closer cooperation with foreign forces, opposed to cooperation with fellow countrymen is, in essence, an action to escalate the confrontation with compatriots and start a war against them. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The anti-DPRK nuclear campaign desperately kicked up by the south Korean conservative authorities in cooperation with foreign forces reveals their criminal intention to disarm the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear threat" from it, a fiction, and realize their wild ambition to stifle it. 
					
					 It is the ulterior aim sought by the group of Lee Myung Bak through its cooperation with foreign forces in the nuclear racket to give momentum to the nuclear campaign of foreign forces against the DPRK and put its scenario to stifle the DPRK into practice at any cost.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are getting desperate in their cooperation in the war moves of foreign forces to threaten peace on the Korean Peninsula and ignite a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' cooperation with foreign forces in the war moves is, in essence, cooperation in the moves for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group claims that its military cooperation with the United States is aimed at bolstering what it called "war deterrence" and ensuring "peace and stability", but this is nothing but sophism intended to cover up its bellicose nature and justify its moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are becoming noisier in its anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked off in cooperation with foreign forces. 
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is busy staging a conspiratorial anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign in the international area including the UN in league with some unsavory forces in an effort to tarnish the image of the DPRK and escalate the inter-Korean confrontation. 
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon the despicable group of traitors for working hard to harm the destiny of the country and the nation and block its reunification while standing in confrontation with fellow countrymen and cooperating with foreign aggressor forces, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korea's Fascist Suppression of Member of Pomminryon Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Fascist Suppression of Member of Pomminryon Slammed
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on December 13 denouncing the puppet authorities for their fascist crackdown upon a leading member of the organization.
					 It accused the fascist police of arresting Kim Se Chang, organizational chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, on the same day.
					
					  Recalling that legal actions are being suppressed as illegal ones owing to the dictatorship of Lee Myung Bak, the statement held that the fascist regime should step down as early as possible as it is   hell-bent on the violation of human rights and the suppression of democracy.
					
					  If the authorities want to escape from a stern judgment from history and the nation, they should release Kim Se Chang and other prisoners of conscience engaged in the movement of independence, democracy and reunification, the statement noted.
					
					 Noting that it is urgent to eliminate the dictatorial regime, the "National Security Law" and security machines, the statement called upon the people from all walks of life to frustrate the frantic rackets of the repressive forces to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and crack down upon people.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities Urged to Stop Projects for Improving Four Rivers
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities Urged to Stop Projects for Improving Four Rivers 
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice at a meeting in Seoul on December 13 demanded the puppet authorities stop at once the projects for improving four rivers.
					 The organization accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of destroying nature through the projects and driving peasants out of their cradles.
					
					 Religionists have staged prayer meetings, candlelight actions, etc. in demand of a halt to the projects but the "government" and the "National Assembly" railroaded a budget for the projects on December 8, the organization deplored.
					
					 It declared that it would intensify the actions for putting an end to the projects and forcing the treacherous "regime" to step down.

articles.title: British Organizations Call for Support to Korean People's Cause
articles.content:
British Organizations Call for Support to Korean People's Cause
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Dec. 11 in support of the just struggle of the Korean people against the U.S. imperialists and the puppet authorities of south Korea's moves to provoke a new war. 
					 The statement called on the whole world to voice invariable support for the DPRK over the recent situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK, a revolutionary, anti-imperialist and sovereign socialist state, is a country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. It is standing in direct military confrontation with imperialists and their stooges. 
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and the puppet authorities of south Korea are running the whole gamut of plots to stifle the DPRK in order to quench the torchlight of Juche, the torchlight of independence and socialism. 
					
					 The Korean People's Army led by Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander of Songun, will never allow enemies to intrude into the inviolable territory of the DPRK even 0.001 mm.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists will never be able to encroach upon even an inch of the territory of the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon all the progressives in the world to unite close around the DPRK, an independent country.

articles.title: US Policy toward DPRK Slashed in Pakistan
articles.content:
US Policy toward DPRK Slashed in Pakistan 
 Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Seven political parties and organizations including the Punjab Provincial Committee of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan, the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Pakistan Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity and the Pakistan Trade Union Federation made public a joint statement on Dec. 8 denouncing the United States and the puppet warmongers of south Korea for their reckless moves for invading the DPRK. 
					 Holding the U.S. accountable for escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula these days, the statement went on:
					
					 When the Yonphyong Island incident occurred, the U.S. instructed the nuclear-powered carrier George Washington to participate in the combined war exercises kicked off together with the puppet armed forces of south Korea. 
					
					 This clearly indicates that the U.S. was a crafty criminal who deliberately planned the incident and wire-pulled it behind the scene.  
					
					 The U.S. imperialists orchestrated the warship "Cheonan" case in a bid to keep its military base in Okinawa as it is. 
					
					 We accuse the U.S. imperialists of persistently standing in the way of solving any issue related to peace and stability by escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 We demand the U.S. imperialists immediately roll back their hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We support all the self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Days Commemorated
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Days Commemorated
Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Mexico, a lecture in Guinea and a film show in the Czech Republic from Dec. 7 to 11 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, spoke highly of the undying feats Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk performed in developing the KPA.
					
					 He stressed that the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk in the building of the armed forces would shine forever in the history of Kim Il Sung's nation. 
					
					 Secouna Camara, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, said that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA marked an event to be specially recorded in the history of the development of the KPA. He explained that the KPA has been firmly prepared to be a mainstay and main force for accomplishing the cause of socialism and an army strong in ideology and faith as it is led by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang', winner of Kim Il Sung Prize."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza cooperacion militar EE.UU.-Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza cooperacion militar EE.UU.-Japon
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- A lo largo de los 50 anos pasados despues de la enmienda del "Tratado de Seguridad Estados Unidos-Japon", los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses no pararon sus acciones para agredir, desatar la guerra, y provocar militarmente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e intervenir en ella. 
					Senala asi el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Como parte de los preparativos para llevar a la nueva etapa el "sistema de seguridad EE.UU.-Japon", ambos paises revisaron y modificaron este ano la "guia de cooperacion EE.UU.-Japon en la defensa", aprobada en 1997, y el plan de la operacion conjunta "5055" para el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, elaborado y publicado en 2004.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de enmendar la mencionada "guia" con el fin de atacar a la RPDC movilizando generalmente las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana, segun la demanda de los imperialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					El plan "5055" indica detalladamente los contenidos y los medios de operacion y los modos de provocacion de guerra y ataque en el supuesto "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Sintetizando este y  otros planes de operaciones militares elaborados hasta ahora para provocar la nueva guerra en Corea, los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses pretendieron fraguar el nuevo guion de la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					Lo que llama la atencion en la confabulacion militar entre esos dos paises esta en los preparativos acelerados para desarrollar y emplazar en conjunto el sistema antimisiles.
					
					Los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU-Japon fueron las maniobras realizadas en el marco de la alianza militar tripartita, o sea, entre ellos y el Sur de Corea, con vistas a atacar preventivamente a la RPDC. 
					
					En medio de la situacion a punto de guerra, los imperialistas norteamericanos libraron incesantemente en el cielo, la tierra y el mar del Sur de Corea y Japon los ejercicios belicos contra la RPDC movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas satelites y hasta el colectivo de ataque movil de portaaviones.
					
					Todo esto partio de su "diplomacia de canonero", estrategia de pavor y guion de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que no podran conseguir nada con la confabulacion militar para la agresion.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia connivencia anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia connivencia anti-RPDC
  Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Tras provocar el incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong, las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas cooperan mas estrechamente en estos dias con su amo norteamericano y el japones para calumniar a la connacional RPDC y desatar a toda costa la guerra contra ella. 
					  En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el periodico Minju Joson sentencio que no pueden permitir nunca esa locura antinacional, y continuo:
					
					  Tal cooperacion anti-RPDC muestra las motivaciones que condujeron a las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas a provocar el incidente de la isla Yonphyong. Llevar la situacion al borde de guerra provocando intencionalmente un incidente de choque armado y atropellar a los connacionales, tomandolo por pretexto, con el apoyo de las fuerzas extranjeras, he aqui la meta que persiguieron ellas.
					
					  La dominacion y la subyugacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea se profundizan a traves de la cooperacion anti-RPDC que usa el primero para realizar su ambicion de tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					  La aprovecha tambien Japon que acecha la oportunidad de reagredir a Corea. Recientemente, el premier japones, Naoto Kan, anuncio abiertamente que esta examinando el envio de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a la Peninsula Coreana para proteger a los japoneses residentes aqui en el supuesto "tiempo de emergencia".
					
					  Si los conservadores surcoreanos desatan la guerra anti-RPDC junto con sus amos gringo y japones, tendran que pagarlo muy caro y seran arruinados ellos mismos.
					
					  EE.UU. y Japon deben saber que nunca sera realizada su siniestra intencion de provocar la guerra contra la RPDC azuzando a los conservadores surcoreanos para sacar provechos de ella.

articles.title: Entidades britanicas exhortan a unirse en torno a Corea
articles.content:
Entidades britanicas exhortan a unirse en torno a Corea 
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de la Politica de Songun y el Grupo de Estudio de la Idea Juche, de Gran Bretana, hicieron publica el dia 11 una declaracion conjunta en apoyo a la justa lucha del pueblo coreano contra las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas para provocar la nueva guerra. 
					La nota exhorta a todo el mundo a apoyar invariablemente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en relacion con la reciente situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Corea es el Estado socialista revolucionario y antiimperialista y pais independiente, autarquico y de autodefensa, apunta el documento y continua:
					
					Ella se enfrenta directamente con armas con el imperialismo y sus lacayos.
					
					Las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas, incluso EE.UU., y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas se valen de todas las intrigas para apagar la antorcha del Juche, independencia y socialismo al atropellar a Corea. 
					
					El Ejercito Popular de Corea guiado por            Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, General Insigne del Songun, no cedera ni una pulgada de su sagrado territorio. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos no podran invadir ni un palmo del territorio de la RPDC.
					
					Aprovechando esta ocasion, exhortamos a todos pueblos progresistas del mundo a unirse en torno a Corea, pais independiente.

articles.title: Entidades pakistanies condenan politica anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Entidades pakistanies condenan politica anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los 7 partidos politico y entidades, incluyendo el Comite del Partido Nacional de Trabajadores de Pakistan en la Provincia de Punjab, el Comite Pakistani de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, la Organizacion Pakistani para la Solidaridad con los Pueblos Afro-Asiaticos y la Federacion Sindical de Pakistan, hicieron publica el dia 8 una declaracion conjunta condenando las imprudentes maniobras agresivas anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos.
					  Recae sobre EE.UU. la agravacion en estos dias de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana, senala la nota y continua:
					
					  Tan pronto como estallo el incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong EE.UU. hizo participar su portaaviones nuclear "George Washington" en el entrenamiento conjunto que se realiza junto con el ejercito titere surcoreano en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Tal hecho prueba fehacientemente que EE.UU. es el astuto criminal que planifico y manipulo intencionalmente el presente incidente.
					
					  Ademas, los imperialistas yanquis inventaron el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Choenan" y mantuvieron su base militar en Okinawa, Japon.
					
					  Condenamos al imperialismo norteamericano que obstaculiza la solucion de cualesquier problemas relacionados con la paz y la estabilidad persiguiendo la tension militar en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Exigimos que los yanquis retiren inmediatamente su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					  Apoyamos todas las medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC.

articles.title: Acoge 400o aniversario el libro clasico de medicina
articles.content:
Acoge 400o aniversario el libro clasico de medicina
Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Transcurrieron 400 anos desde que se dio a luz la enciclopedia de la medicina tradicional Coryo "Guia de Medicina Oriental".
					  Este libro de 25 tomos, "Hyangyakjipsongbang" de 85 tomos publicado en 1433 y "Uibangryuchui" de 365 tomos redactado en 1445 son 3 clasicos de la medicina Coryo conocidos ampliamente en el mundo.
					
					  "Guia de Medicina Oriental", que sintetiza los exitos de la medicina Coryo alcanzados hasta principios del siglo 17, fue redactado en 1610 por Ho Jun (1546-1615), galeno renombrado entonces,  tomando por referencia largas experiencias clinicas y centenares de libros de medicina.
					
					  Se compone de 2 tomos de catalogo, 4 de la parte de medicina interna, 4 de medicina externa, 11 de la parte de enfermedades, 3 de las pocimas y 1 de acupuntura y moxibustion.
					
					  Estos volumenes muestran la anatomia y fisiologia del cuerpo humano y los metodos de diagnosis, prevencion y tratamiento de varias enfermedades.
					
					  A pesar de ser muy voluminoso, el libro ensena en terminos faciles las recetas de cura, inclusive las tradicionales como pocimas, acupuntura y moxibustion, segun los tipos de enfermedades.
					
					  Ha sido reeditado varias veces como en 1814 y 1874 y divulgado en China y Japon.
					
					  "Guia de Medicina Oriental" basado en argumentos cientificos y logicos contribuyo mucho al desarrollo de la medicina de la humanidad y se usa ampliamente hoy tambien en el tratamiento de enfermedades para el pueblo. 
					
					  Se ha publicado en 1962 en la lengua coreana contemporanea.
					
					  En 1982 se dieron a luz 5 tomos del mismo libro con glosario y texto original.
					
					  El citado libro se transmitira para siempre en la historia de la Corea del Songun en prosperidad contribuyendo a la clinica y la investigacion de la historia de medicina coreana y al fomento de la salud del pueblo.
